name: Smoked Turkey Breast
keywords: fall, winter, main course, molasses, pickling spices, turkey breast
recipeIngredient: 1 6- to 8-pound whole turkey breast, with skin on

recipeInstructions.text: Combine marinade ingredients, marinate the breast for four hours, turning occasionally. Remove from the marinade and let sit overnight on a rack to drain, uncovered, in the refrigerator.
Smoke for 4 to 6 hours. Skin breast before using.
